dmca.title: [ABUSE] Notice of Copyright Infringement/DMCA Take Down Demand per 17 USC 512 (c)
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, January 27, 2006 7:59 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] Notice of Copyright Infringement/DMCA Take Down Demand
per 17 USC 512 (c)

This message was received at abuse@theplanet.com on Wednesday, January 25,
2006 at
9:56:36 PM and concerns a matter for which responsibility is delegated to
your team. The message and headers follow.

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

SUBJECT:
[ABUSE] Notice of Copyright Infringement/DMCA Take Down Demand per 17 USC
512 (c)

MESSAGE BODY:
To Whom It May Concern:

I am writing to file a notice of copyright infringement in accordance with
the Digital Millennium Copyright Act.

1. The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on "http://
proxify.com/tos.shtml". Proxify.com is a wholly owned subsidiary of
UpsideOut, Inc. and has been in operation since 2003-04-14.


2. The material that we believe is infringing the copyrighted work listed in
item #1 appears on "http://www.4proxy.com/tos.htm" which is located at IP
address "70.87.122.212". This material is copied entirely except that all
the appearances of our trademark and tradename "Proxify" have been changed
to their name.


3. My contact information:
Name: Justin Schlecter
Company: UpsideOut, Inc. D.B.A Proxify
Address: 1333A N. Ave., STE 315, New Rochelle, NY 10804
Phone: 1-877-PROXIFY
Email: webmaster@proxify.com


4. Contact information for the owner of the allegedly infringing
material:


5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials
described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright
owner, its agent, or the law.

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the
notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized
to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly
infringed.

Signed,
Justin Schlecter, 2006-01-25
Proxify.com Administrator
1-877-PROXIFY





RFC822 HEADERS:

        by mail.theplanet.com with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256)
        (Exim 4.50)
        id 1F1yFo-0004En-1q
        for abuseadm@theplanet.com; Wed, 25 Jan 2006 21:57:00 -0600

helo=[216.185.111.52])

abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com)
        with esmtp (Exim)
        id 1F1yFl-0008Ae-JI

        (Exim 4.50) id 1F1yFk-0004EW-1g
        for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 25 Jan 2006 21:56:56 -0600

1F1yFg-000GmY-Js
